Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Alpha-defensin-related sequence 7 (Defensin-related cryptdin 3; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Apparent precursor of a secreted, cationic, proline- and cysteine-rich peptide that contains Cys-Pro-Xaa repeats. Unlike cryptdin, the proposed mature peptide region lacks the structural motif characteristic of defensins. It may have microbicidal activit.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Paneth cells of the small bowel.

Literature.Title: A family of defensin-like genes codes for diverse cysteine-rich peptides in mouse Paneth cells.
Literature.Author: Huttner K.M, Ouellette A.J.

Literature.Title: Increased diversity of intestinal antimicrobial peptides by covalentdimer formation.
Literature.Author: Hornef M.W, Putsep K, Karlsson J, Refai E, Andersson M.
